riddles.riddle: One of our favorite movie series, with the saddest story arc. Who is my favorite character? Hint: He is a trash panda.
riddles.description: We're starting the trip off with your favorite ride: Guardians of the Galaxy!

riddles.riddle: This one is a vine reference, think of a keen smell. We even got a candle for this one. Hint is What happened to the Library of Alexandria?
riddles.description: Now that Johnny has lowered the height requirement, let's relax on Spaceship Earth.

riddles.riddle: Our bonus nephews name, this ride should be considered his!
riddles.description: Time to ride Soarin' - just for our bonus nephew!

riddles.riddle: You're slowly getting me into fish, but still not sushi... this one is in the Japan pavilion, it's a Gabi-coded snack. What's it called?
riddles.description: Let's head to Japan for a Gabi-coded snack: frushi!

riddles.riddle: You always call my food this when it has no protein :)
riddles.description: You always call it Girl Dinner when there's no protein - let's eat!

riddles.riddle: From the latest Guardians movie, who was Rocket's best friend?
riddles.description: Let's go ride Guardians again! Fingers crossed for a new song.

riddles.riddle: Not sure if you've seen the trend on TikTok for the Kendrick Disney Remix, "We can take the tram or we can take the SKYLINERRRR!!"
riddles.description: It's time to park hop - let's take the Skyliner to Hollywood Studios!

riddles.riddle: This is something you've mentioned in passing, this has been the hardest secret to keep. Our R Droid will be excited for a friend.
riddles.description: I booked Droid Depot. Let's build our very own R-unit!

riddles.riddle: You always make this reference when we get on a plane!
riddles.description: Smugglers Run next - and YOU will be the pilot.

riddles.riddle: Now that you have a little friend who wants to fly, who will be pilot?
riddles.description: Now it's C-3PO's turn to fly us in Star Tours!

riddles.riddle: Now it's time for a yummy dinner that we always look forward to, we usually order the same thing, but it's never as spicy as it claims.
riddles.description: Dinner time: Docking Bay 7, our go-to not-spicy spicy chicken!
Let's wind down. Thank you for letting me plan this special day. I love you!
